resources.string: Welcome to GiveMeTime! Before starting using the app we\'ll need some little informations to help you organize everything better! \n Keep in mind that the more information you\'ll give to GiveMeTime, the more you\'ll have precise and efficient results. Don\'t worry: we care about your privacy and all the personal datas you\'ll insert will be stored only on your device and you\'ll be the only one who can access them. \n The list of your tasks will be safely synchronized with your Google account to let you access your GiveMeTime calendar from every device, anyway, to protect your privacy, the informations related to GiveMeTime will be stored exclusively on your smartphone
